content: For sales questions, contact us at

comment.text: This translation key is used for a link to contact the sales team. It appears as a button or link in the PortalSettings page, allowing users to get in touch with sales inquiries.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'For sales questions, contact us at' is not perfectly captured by 'Satış sualları üçün bizimlə əlaqə saxlayın:'. A more accurate translation would be 'Satışla bağlı suallarınız varsa, bizimlə əlaqə saxlayın:' or 'Satışla əlaqəli suallarınız varsa, bizimlə əlaqə saxlayın:'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Satışla bağlı suallarınız varsa, bizimlə əlaqə saxlayın:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation is overly formal and verbose for the English phrase 'For sales questions, contact us at'. It translates literally as 'In case of questions concerning sales, contact us at the address...'. This is not the common phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kontaktujte nás ohledně prodejních dotazů na

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation does not include the 'at' part, which would typically contain contact information like an email address or phone number.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: The contact method needs to be added after 'na'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Beim Fragen zum Verkauf kontaktieren Sie uns unter' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'For sales questions, contact us at'. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'Bei Fragen zum Verkauf kontaktieren Sie uns'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bei Fragen zum Verkauf kontaktieren Sie uns

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Si tiene preguntas sobre ventas, póngase en contacto con nosotros a través de' is overly verbose and doesn't directly translate "For sales questions, contact us at". A more direct translation would be "Para preguntas sobre ventas, contáctenos a".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Para preguntas sobre ventas, contáctenos a

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation 'Myyntiin liittyviin kysymyksiin liittyen, ota meihin yhteyttä osoitteessa' is overly verbose and doesn't accurately convey the simplicity of the English phrase 'For sales questions, contact us at'. The repetition of 'liittyen' makes it sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Myyntikysymyksiin liittyen, ota yhteyttä

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation lacks the 'at' part, which indicates a contact method (email address, phone number, etc.).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Myyntikysymyksiin liittyen, ota yhteyttä osoitteeseen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Per questioni d’acquisto, contattaci all’indirizzo' isn't a direct or natural translation of 'For sales questions, contact us at'. 'Acquisto' implies 'purchase' rather than 'sales'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Per domande relative alle vendite, contattaci a

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is too literal. 'For sales questions, contact us at' implies a direct method of contact (like an email address or phone number). The Japanese translation, "販売に関するご質問は、次のメールアドレスまでお問い合わせください:" translates to 'For sales related questions, please contact us at the following email address:'. It's technically correct but lacks the conversational tone of the English phrase. A more natural translation might be 'Please contact us for sales inquiries' or 'If you have sales questions, please contact us'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 販売に関するご質問は、こちらまでお問い合わせください (Hanbai ni kansuru go shitsumon wa, kochira made o-toiawase kudasai) - For sales inquiries, please contact us.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '판매 관련 질문은 다음 주소로 문의하세요:' literally translates to 'For questions related to sales, please inquire at the following address:'. While understandable, it's a bit formal and doesn't fully capture the brevity and conversational tone of the English phrase 'For sales questions, contact us at'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural and concise translation like '영업 문의는' or '판매 문의는'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation includes a full stop at the end of the sentence. While grammatically correct, it might be more appropriate to omit it for consistency with other similar phrases in the application or website.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the full stop at the end of the sentence: '판매 관련 질문은 다음 주소로 문의하세요'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ສໍາລັບຄໍາຖາມການຂາຍ, ຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາທີ່' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Lao. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'ຖາມຄໍາຖາມກ່ຽວກັບການຂາຍ, ຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາທີ່' or 'ສໍາລັບຄໍາຖາມກ່ຽວກັບການຂາຍ, ກະລຸນາຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາທີ່'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສໍາລັບຄໍາຖາມກ່ຽວກັບການຂາຍ, ກະລຸນາຕິດຕໍ່ພວກເຮົາທີ່

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ja ir jautājumi par pārdošanu, sazinieties ar mums pa' is a reasonable translation but could be improved for a more natural feel. 'Pa' can be a bit clunky here. A more natural phrasing would be 'Par pārdošanas jautājumiem, sazinieties ar mums'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Par pārdošanas jautājumiem, sazinieties ar mums

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'Contactaţi-ne pentru întrebări despre vânzări pe' doesn't accurately reflect the English phrase 'For sales questions, contact us at'. The 'pe' at the end is unnecessary and grammatically incorrect in this context. It suggests a location, not a means of contact.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Contactaţi-ne pentru întrebări despre vânzări.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'По вопросам продаж обращайтесь к нам по адресу:' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Russian. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Для вопросов, касающихся продаж, свяжитесь с нами'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Для вопросов, касающихся продаж, свяжитесь с нами

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "For sales questions, contact us at" is best translated more naturally in Serbian. The current translation, while technically correct, sounds somewhat stiff and unnatural. A better translation would emphasize the directness of the contact.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: За упитама везаним за продају, контактирајте нас на

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'For sales questions, contact us at' is best translated as 'Satış sorularınız için bizimle iletişime geçin' or 'Satışla ilgili sorularınız için bizimle iletişim kurun'. 'Şu adresten bize ulaşın' implies a physical address, which is not necessarily what's intended.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Satış sorularınız için bizimle iletişime geçin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'З питань продажів звертайтеся до нас за адресою' is a bit too literal. While not incorrect, it's not the most natural way to say 'For sales questions, contact us at' in Ukrainian.  A better phrasing would be more conversational.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: З питань продажу звертайтеся до нас

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Đối với câu hỏi về việc bán hàng, xin hãy liên hệ với chúng tôi tại" is a literal translation and a bit awkward. 'For sales questions' is better translated as something more natural in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có câu hỏi về sản phẩm/dịch vụ, vui lòng liên hệ với chúng tôi tại

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "如有任何销售问题，可联系我们:" is a literal translation but could be more natural. While accurate, it lacks nuance for customer-facing communication. A more idiomatic rendering might improve user experience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 如有销售疑问，欢迎联系我们。
